description:
Would you want a clearer mind and a healthier body. Have you lost your faith and respect in conventional western medicine? Do you feel there must be a simple and holistic way to keep a balanced life.

Would you love to be able to activate your own inner energy at any time? How about the ability to know which areas on your body to press to activate self esteem and confidence?

If you responded yes to any of these than you may be in the right place.

There are ancient healings art forms that have lasted over 5000 years that were known to increase your life's span, focus, fertility, blood flow and strength.

In this course Supercharge Your Life!! A Crash Course On Your Meridians you will learn about your super powerful built-in energy system that left unchecked; can wreck havoc on you mental, emotional and physical well-being.

You will learn about Chi and how it surround us and how it is the fuel for your spirit.

This course is ideal to someone new to holistic health and searching for a natural way to empower themselves. No more life blocks and plateaus that stem from stagnant energy. Supercharge your life!!

In this course you will learn....

  • To feel your own inner energy
  • The 5 phases of Qi
  • The root cause of most major illnesses
  • The two dynamic opposite energies that are active within you
  • Your complete meridian system
  • Excercises to easily and effortlessly keep your meridians open and healthy


What are the requirements?

  • An open mind
  • No prior knowledge is needed
  • A eagerness to learn
  • A able body to do the course exercises
  • A basic understanding of the human body


Target Audience....

  • Anyone interested in the metaphysical aspects of health and healing
  • Anyone interested in tapping into and awakening their true and higher self
  • Anyone ready to live an empowered life
  • Anyone sick of going to and relying on the doctor.
  • Anyone ready for change
title: Supercharge Your Life!! A Crash Course On Your Meridians
